name: Brian Hoang
bio:
Brian is a sophomore studying Software Engineering and Entrepreneurship. He conducts 
			  NLP research in the Human Language Technology Research Institute, and has held software 
			  engineering internships at IntelliEpi and Raytheon. He will be interning at Credera 
			  during summer 2017. During his spare time, Brian can be found playing sports, rocking a 
			  piano, or watching horror movies with his eyes closed.
